attributes.action: send non british nationals home to serve their prison sentance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: send all non british prisoners back to their own country to serve thier sentance in own prison. freeing up over 10,000 spaces. we are members of EU so they can go home, Ayslum seekers should be sent straight back

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
